name: Amber Catalyst
r1: Normal Attack hits increase all Elemental DMG by 6% for 6s. Max 2 stacks.
r2: Normal Attack hits increase all Elemental DMG by 7.5% for 6s. Max 2 stacks.
r3: Normal Attack hits increase all Elemental DMG by 9% for 6s. Max 2 stacks.
r4: Normal Attack hits increase all Elemental DMG by 10.5% for 6s. Max 2 stacks.
r5: Normal Attack hits increase all Elemental DMG by 12% for 6s. Max 2 stacks.
